title: AMP Capital renews lease at Brisbane office park Milton Green
text:
Exploration company Legacy Iron Ore has relocated to the Perth CBD from West Perth after striking a part-floor lease deal at the office building at 200 Adelaide Terrace.

The 268sq m lease at level 6 came with incentives and flexible terms including fitouts on a net annual rent of $240 a square metre.

CBRE’s Andrew Denny represented the 7300sq m building's owner, Mary Donald Nominees.

Space Glory

Early learning group Gloryland Childcare and Kindergarten is opening its third Melbourne location at newly leased space at storage and workspace property The Base in Melbourne's Mitcham.

Gloryland has signed a 15-year lease on a 1495sq m commercial space to accommodate a 138-place centre saying it was attracted to The Base’s flexible spaces.

Sector Property Group built the property which has units ranging from 29 to 80sq m.

Tech move

Advertisement

Tech business Tongyu Communication will move into an 830sq m warehouse at 53 Cosgrove Road in Sydney's Strathfield South after signing a three-year lease at a net annual rent of $135 a square metre.

The high clearance building has a yard.

CBRE’s Raj Chaudhary and Cathy Henderson negotiated for landlord, Sam the Paving Man.

Sunshine Coast’s Maroochydore Homemaker Centre. Supplied

Hire and style

Domayne furniture Hire and Property Styling has signed a seven-year lease with options over an office/warehouse in Brisbane’s Northgate for an expansion.

The 2398sq m building on a 4000sq m site at 62 Crockford Street has about 20 car spaces and a cafe to service clients who hire home-styling packages.

Rents are confidential but indicative annual rents in the area are between $135 and $155 a square metre.

Advertisement

Ray White's Aaron Aleckson, Andrew Doyle and Paul Anderson and CBRE were the agents.

Showtime

Furniture retailers James Lane and The Custom Sofa Centre have signed new leases at the Sunshine Coast’s Maroochydore Homemaker Centre.

James Lane committed to a 958sq m showroom for seven years while The Custom Sofa Centre agreed terms on a five-year lease over a 446sq m showroom. They will become both retailers’ first Sunshine Coast outlets.

The Harvey Norman owns and anchors the 32,620sq m centre at 11-55 Maroochy Boulevard which features over 25 tenancies and 900 car spaces.

CBRE's Andrew Brimson and Sam Macgregor negotiated the leases.

Advertisement

Service Stream Holdings Pty Ltd have leased space at 8 West Street, North Sydney. supplied

West Street lease

Service Stream Holdings has leased a 554.5sq m top floor office on Level 10 at 8 West Street, North Sydney from Maville Group Australia.

The five year deal with options closed on a gross annual rent of $686.98 a square metre.

Savills' Christina Malcolm brokered the lease at the newly refurbished building.

Submissions to stan@afr.com
description: Exploration company Legacy Iron Ore has relocated to the Perth CBD from West Perth.
